explains: n. 化学家；<英>药剂师；<英>药店，药房

sentences.en: After graduating, she worked as a chemist.
sentences.cn: 毕业后，她当上了一名药剂师。

sentences.en: The chemist dissolved some material in hot water.
sentences.cn: 化学家将一些物质溶解在热水里。

sentences.en: It was created by a French chemist, Angelo Mariani, in 1863.
sentences.cn: 它是由法国化学家安吉洛·马里亚尼于1863年创造的。
